## Phase 1 ‚Äì Internal setup (Owner + Martin)

### Owner ([OWNER NAME])

  - [ ] Google Ads (if included)

## Phase 2 ‚Äì Access & tracking ([COORDINATOR NAME])

- [ ] Get admin access to:

## Phase 3 ‚Äì Strategy & offer (Owner + [COORDINATOR NAME])

### Owner ([OWNER NAME])
- [ ] Define / approve main offer(s):

  - [ ] Pricing / discount rules
  - [ ] Desired KPI (CPL / ROAS / lead volume etc.)

- [ ] Define overall 90-day strategy:
  - [ ] Priority channels (Meta / Google / YouTube / SEO / Email / Video)
  - [ ] Budget split by channel
  - [ ] First 90-day objective (e.g., X leads/month at max ‚Çπ CPL)

### [COORDINATOR NAME]
- [ ] Create short **Strategy doc** (Notion page under the client):

  - [ ] Key pain points and angles
  - [ ] Funnel overview (awareness ‚Üí lead ‚Üí sale)
  - [ ] Content themes / pillars
- [ ] Share strategy with client and get approval / feedback

### [COORDINATOR NAME] (Copy + creatives)

## Phase 5 ‚Äì Technical campaign setup ([COORDINATOR NAME])

- [ ] Meta Ads setup:
  - [ ] Campaigns created with clear naming (`Client ‚Äì Objective ‚Äì Country ‚Äì Month`)
  - [ ] Ad sets with correct targeting & placements
  - [ ] Daily / lifetime budgets set
  - [ ] Right conversion event selected
  - [ ] Ads created with correct videos, texts, URLs + UTMs

- [ ] Google Ads setup (if in scope):
  - [ ] Campaigns & ad groups created
  - [ ] Keywords / audiences selected
  - [ ] Negative keywords list started
  - [ ] Conversions linked to GA4 / Tags

- [ ] QA before launch:
  - [ ] All links tested (no 404 / wrong pages)
  - [ ] Correct pixels / tags firing
  - [ ] Locations, languages, and devices set properly
  - [ ] Budget and bid strategies reviewed
